description: Crystallographic sweep data set, containing images
title: CollectionSweepData

sweepType.description: Type of sweep: 'simple', 'mesh', 'line', 'helical, 'xray_centring'. Should be made into an enumeration
sweepType.title: Sweep Type

imageWidth.description: Width of a single image, along scanAxis. For rotational axes in degrees, for translations in mm.
imageWidth.title: Image Width

numberImages.description: Number of images from start to end of sweep.Defines image numbering and final axis position. NB Only certain parts of the sweep may be acquired (see 'scans'),so the total number of images acquired may be less.
numberImages.title: Number Images

overlap.description: Overlap between successive images, in units of imageWidth. May be negative for non-contiguous images.
overlap.title: Overlap

numberTriggers.description: Number of triggers. Instruction to detector - does not modify effect of other parameters.
numberTriggers.title: Number Triggers

numberImagesPerTrigger.description: Number of images per trigger. Instruction to detector - does not modify effect of other parameters.
numberImagesPerTrigger.title: Number Images Per Trigger

numberLines.description: Number of scanned lines used for mesh scans. Must divide numberImages
numberLines.title: Number Lines

meshRange.description: Mesh scan range (horizontal, vertical) in mm
meshRange.title: Mesh Range

energy.description: Energy of the beam in eV
energy.title: Energy

resolution.description: Resolution that the sweep was intended to measureFor offset or unusual detectors this may *not* determine the detector distanceThe actual detector distance can be found in axisPositionsStart
resolution.title: Resolution

detectorRoiMode.description: Region-of-interest mode of detector. Should be made into an enumeration
detectorRoiMode.title: Detector Roi Mode

beamPosition.description: x,y position of the beam on the detector in pixels
beamPosition.title: Beam Position

beamSize.description: x,y size of the beam on the detector in mm
beamSize.title: Beam Size

beamShape.description: Shape of the beam. NBNB Should be an enumeration
beamShape.title: Beam Shape

detectorType.description: Type of detector, using enumeration of mmCIF items diffrn_detector.type (https://mmcif.wwpdb.org/dictionaries/mmcif_pdbx_v50.dic/Items/_diffrn_detector.type.html)
detectorType.title: Detector Type

detectorBinningMode.description: Binning mode of detector. Should be made into an enumeration
detectorBinningMode.title: Detector Binning Mode

axisPositionsStart.description: Dictionary string:float with starting position of all axes, rotations or translations, including detector distance, by name. Units are mm for distances, degrees for angles NBNB do we use internal motor names (e.g. 'phi'), or std. names (e.g. 'omega')?
axisPositionsStart.title: Axis Positions Start

axisPositionsEnd.description: Dictionary string:float with final position of scanned axes as for axisPositionsStart. scanAxis position is NOT given here, but is calculated from imageWidth, overlap, numberImages, and axisPositionsStartNB scans may be acquired out of order, so this determines the limits of the sweep, not the temporal start and end points
axisPositionsEnd.title: Axis Positions End

scanAxis.description: Name of main scanned axis. Other axes may be scanned in parallel.For mesh scans name of fastest scanned axis
scanAxis.title: Scan Axis

scans.description: List of Scans i.e. subdivisions of CollectionSweep. NB Scans need not be contiguous or in order or add up to entire sweep
scans.title: Scans

prefix.description: Input parameter - used to build the fine name template.
prefix.title: Prefix

filenameTemplate.description: File name template,  includes prefix, suffix, run number, and a slot where image number can be filled in.
filenameTemplate.title: Filename Template

path.description: Path to directory containing image files.
path.title: Path
